name: Lekirpay for WooCommerce
author: Lekir Tech

sections.description:
Accept payment on your WooCommerce store through multiple payment channels via Lekirpay payment gateway.

Signup Lekirpay merchant account here for live or here for sandbox.
sections.installation:
Step 1:

  • Login to your WordPress Dashboard
  • Navigate to Plugins >> Add New
  • Search Lekirpay for WooCommerce >> Install Now

Step 2:

  • Activate Plugin

Step 3:

  • Navigate to WooCommerce >> Settings >> Payment >> Lekirpay and click Manage
  • Insert your Client ID, Lekirkey and Lekir-Signature Key (optional)
  • Save changes
sections.faq:
Where can i get Client ID, Lekirkey and Lekir-Signature Key ?

  • Signin Lekirpay merchant account

  • Make sure account is verified

  • Go to the top right of the menu

  • Click the store icon, next click profile button

  • Navigate to API tab

What if I have some other question related to Lekirpay?

You may visit our complete FAQ Documentation here or create a ticket here if there any problem regarding this plugin.
